attributes.action: Fans have the choice to listen to the Premier league referees mic.
attributes.additional_details: Fans have the choice to listen to the Premier league referees mic. Make the Premier league referees be mic'd up so that fans get an explanation for reasons of decisions.
attributes.background: Fans have the choice to listen to the Premier league referees mic. Make the Premier league referees be mic'd up so that fans get an explanation for reasons of decisions.

rejection.details: This is a matter for broadcasters and the footballing authorities.
